enchantment.allurement.reforming.desc: Yer gadget be gettin' better slowly
enchantment.allurement.ascension_curse.d: Yer cursed stuff ascend to tha heavens when dropped
enchantment.allurement.fleeting_curse.de: Yer cursed stuff run away from all tha creatures n' beasts when dropped
enchantment.allurement.reeling.desc: Hook yer target towards ye when th' bolt hits
enchantment.allurement.spread_of_ailment: Curse sailors you shoot with all ye active ailments
enchantment.allurement.alleviating.desc: Tharr coins o' experience now treat yer bad humors
enchantment.allurement.vengeance.desc: When ye ship takes a cannon, yer next cannon become stronger
enchantment.allurement.shockwave.desc: Hit all th' sailors near ye w' a big shockwave when ye fall
